quotes.quote: Civilization degrades the many to exalt the few.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: When several villages are united in a single complete community, large enough to nearly or quite self-sufficing, the state comes into existence, originating in the bare needs of life, and continuing in existence for the sake of a good life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Underlying the whole scheme of civilization is the confidence men have in each other, confidence in their integrity, confidence in their honesty, confidence in their future.
quotes.author: Bourke Cockran

quotes.quote: We must remember that any oppression, any injustice, any hatred, is a wedge designed to attack our civilization.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The more rapidly a civilization progresses, the sooner it dies for another to rise in its place.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: It is better for civilization to be going down the drain than to be coming up it.
quotes.author: Henry Allen

quotes.quote: But the greatest menace to our civilization today is the conflict between giant organized systems of self-righteousness-each system only too delighted to find that the other is wicked-each only too glad that the sins give it the pretext for still deeper hatred and animosity.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.
quotes.author: Julian Jaynes

quotes.quote: Civilization is the art of living in towns of such size the everyone does not know everyone else.
quotes.author: Max Nordau

quotes.quote: Civilization is built on a number of ultimate principles...respect for human life, the punishment of crimes against property and persons, the equality of all good citizens before the law...or, in a word justice.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: America is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The end of the human race will be that it will eventually die of civilization.
quotes.author: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The true civilization is where every man gives to every other every right that he claims for himself.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Civilization begins with order, grows with liberty, and dies with chaos.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: You can't say that civilization don't advance, however, for in every war they kill you in a new way.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: One of the indictments of civilizations is that happiness and intelligence are so rarely found in the same person.
